MILLERGROUP Intelligence, Inc.

When You Need Answers, We Find Them

Discreet investigations and professional process serving in Park City and throughout Utah, California, and Montana

Get a Confidential Consultation Our Services

Your Privacy. Your Peace of Mind. Our Priority.

For nearly 30 years, individuals throughout Park City, Summit County, and the Mountain West have trusted MILLERGROUP Intelligence when they need answers. Founded in 1995 by licensed private investigator Michael Miller, we understand that reaching out for help isn't easy—especially when it involves your personal life.

Whether you're facing suspicions in a relationship or need legal documents served reliably and discreetly, we're here to help with compassion, confidentiality, and local expertise you can count on.
